magenta-day_one-default.text: Dr Pink, your tardiness has been noted
magenta-day_one-default.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-yes.text: Dr Pink... nobody could have predicted that the moon would correct its course. I stand by your decision completely
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-yes.text: It's impossible... it doesn't make any sense
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_two-no.text: Let's hope that this meeting is more productive than the last, shall we?
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: magenta
